message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it has immense value and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm proposing a price of $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe that's a more reasonable price for this product, considering its value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $850000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $925000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.

I understand that you're still looking for a better price, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum acceptable price. I'm willing to make one more concession and propose a price of $912500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $875000. I believe that's a fair price for the product, considering its value to me.
